body.name: RiverRidge, White Monroe Two-Door Floor Cabinet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 21 mins
features: Versatile design features white painted finish, vertical inset panels, and rectangular, matte black handles
One adjustable and one fixed interior shelf, plus a spacious top shelf for versatile storage and display options in any room of the home
Fully enclosed shelving hide toiletries, towels, and other clutter behind two soft-close doors for a clean presentation
Includes easy-to-follow assembly instructions and adjustable brackets to anchor to the wall for added safety and stability
Pair with additional Monroe Collection items for a completely organized space with modern style
body.description: Featuring an adjustable interior shelf and a spacious top shelf, this floor cabinet makes a versatile storage option in any room of the home. With a classic white finish, inset paneling and matte black handles, its fully enclosed shelves hide toiletries, towels, and other clutter behind two soft-close doors for a clean presentation. Easy-to-follow assembly instructions and adjustable brackets are included to anchor to the wall for added safety and stability. Pair with additional Monroe Collection items for a completely organized space with modern style.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Monroe Collection! Update your home with the Monroe Collection, where its modern and robust design, clean white finish, and ample storage options come together to create a sophisticated and organized space. Its matte black handles, grooved doors, and inset side paneling add depth and appeal. Behind its doors, you'll discover tons of concealed storage, providing ample space to keep your belongings organized and out of sight. The collection also features spacious display shelves, allowing you to showcase your favorite decorations, perfumes, and lotions. Plus, Monroe furniture pieces are family-friendly, specifically built with adjustable anti-tip wall mounts for added stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: Even though I measured to see size before I ordered this. When it was assembled it was smaller than what I had in my mind. Nice piece of furniture sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I've been looking for
reviews.reviewText: Pretty nice storage cabinet. However you do need your own screwdriver to assemble. Took about an hour and a half to assemble. Trickiest part was putting the hinges and handle on the door. I suggest lying furniture on side, if you don't have a second pair of hands. Other than that I'm happy with my purchase 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a Quality Product
reviews.reviewText: I put the cabinet together and the lug bolts that attach the sides to the top of the cabinet split the side panels on tightening. Both sides now have a 2-3" crack running vertical. I would have returned it but had it almost all together and my spouse in the interest of being neat and clean gave the packing materials to the recycling truck. This is not worth the money buy something a bit more expensive and better constructed with better materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet was exactly what I was looking for. The perfect size and height for the space and provides ample storage. Beautiful design that fits with any space, and can easily change the style with different decor. The assembly process was easy with step by step instructions. So happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This is just the piece I’ve been searching for to fit in my small space. Modern style with adjustable hinges to get the doors positioned perfectly. Took about 40 minutes to assemble and I’m very happy with the finished product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish and offers storage
reviews.reviewText: This cabinetry is so cute! It offers great storage, it’s super durable, and very easy to put together. I love that is offers hidden storage!
